title: Brand New 4 Bd + Office 3.5 Bath Home in Coffey Park
posting_body: Brand new 4 Bedroom home in Coffey Park.
Currently finishing the last touch ups and permit inspections, but the property is ready to show;
Downstairs: Living room 13 x 13 ft Office, Family Room and Kitchen with Granite countertops, 10 ft ceilings, Polished Concrete radiant heated floors.
Garage with Dual 240V 50 Amp outlets for electric car charging.
Upstairs: Large Master suite with walk in closet, Jr Master Suite with dual closets, 2 smaller bedrooms with hall bathroom, Laundry, storage room with shelves, Whole house fan with programable timer;
Outside: Stamped concrete driveway and rear patio, Low maintenance landscape with wifi sprinkler system.
Fruit trees in back yard, Ring video Doorbell (Subscription paid by owner).
Programable Automatic security lights in the eves, Outlets in eves for Christmas lights controlled by inside switch/timer, Siding and eves are made with fire-proof materials;

Costs: Security Deposit $5K Monthly Rent $4150 Fiber internet: (paid by owner), Garbage: (paid by owner), Water/sewer(Paid By Owner), Electric: 4.8 KW Solar system with power wall is in process for installation this fall.
Tenant pays for Gas and rest of the electric;
Home has an ADU above the garage that is rented separately; email for viewing appointment and application.
